contents:
看了几篇文章，感觉他们的水平像是各种杂七杂八的分析文章整合出来然后加点私货，比如
https://sinoinsider.com/2018/12/politics-watch-xis-delivery-of-trade-commitments-hinges-on-the-ccp-factional-struggle/
https://sinoinsider.com/2018/10/politics-watch-decoding-xis-subdued-southern-tour/
https://sinoinsider.com/2018/10/politics-watch-meng-hongwei-purge-hints-at-soft-coup-against-xi/

他们似乎很喜欢在推特上找资料
尤其第三篇网址所发的一段：4. Based on our understanding of the CCP and Party culture, we believe that Xi, like the last Soviet leader Mikhail Gorbachev, will be ultimately unsuccessful in reforming the communist regime. Xi, like Gorbachev, seems determined to give reform a try, and we might yet see developments that read like success for Xi.




他们的观点：习本人不想做老毛，他强调宪政，而老毛反对宪法，说明他想走宪政梦改革，上台清洗江派，试图平反法轮功和天安门事件受害者，用加大权力的手段推进体制改革，也有可能会变成蒋经国。
这网站到底啥水平我不用多说了吧？
